then.line: How about a delicious ball of ice cream?
I love it! I think it's...
Hmmm. Wait. I don't know how long an ice cream ball will last in the window.
They always have them in the window display at the Ice Creamatorium!
That place is refrigerated!
Interesting. But it also makes you think, right?
But, I mean... if you think about it...
Once a ball, always a ball.
How do you mean?
If an ice cream ball melts... does it cease to be a ball? Or it it just...
A melted ball? And is a melted ball still a ball?
We can't possibly do this right now.
Let's move on to Nature Balls.
I've got the best one. Get ready.
I hatched ready.
Pomegranate.
Pomegranate!
Our town's namesake!
And the only fruit where you eat the bones!
What?
Haven't you had a pomegranate before?
You just open it up and crunch through all the bones.
...You think those are bones?
Fruit bones.
I'm extremely excited to hear your answer for Nature Ball.
I've got it!
What are those balls made of pizza?
You mean dough?
No, you know. You take a pizza and you fold it up?
Like a calzone?
Yes! I think that's Italian for "pizza ball".
It is?
I think so. My Italian isn't the best.
Well...I guess we could make sure it's shaped into a ball.
I mean, think about it: Minty's gonna think it's delicious. Plus...
What better way to attract customers than with pizza innovation?
"Also available in gluten-free! Only at the Festi-Ball!"
Hmmm...
I love it! Everyone's gonna want a pizza this action! Let's go on to Nature Ball!
